WHATSAPP_TEMPLATES.TITLE: Message Templates
WHATSAPP_TEMPLATES.DESCRIPTION: Create and manage WhatsApp message templates for your campaigns and automated messages.
WHATSAPP_TEMPLATES.CREATE_SUCCESS: Template created successfully. It may take a few minutes for Meta to approve your template.
WHATSAPP_TEMPLATES.DELETE_CONFIRM_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to delete the template "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
WHATSAPP_TEMPLATES.EMPTY: No templates found. Click 'Create Template' to create your first template or 'Sync Templates' to fetch existing ones.

BASICS.TITLE: Basic Information
BASICS.NAME: Template Name
BASICS.NAME_HELP: Lowercase letters, numbers and underscores only
BASICS.ALLOW_CATEGORY_CHANGE: Allow Meta to change category if needed

HEADER.TITLE: Header
HEADER.MEDIA_DROP_HINT: Click or drag & drop file here
HEADER.MEDIA_INFO_IMAGE: Upload an image for the template header. Recommended: 800x418px, JPEG or PNG
HEADER.MEDIA_INFO_VIDEO: Upload a video for the template header. Max 16MB, MP4 format
HEADER.MEDIA_INFO_DOCUMENT: Upload a PDF document for the template header. Max 100MB
HEADER.FILE_PICKER_AUTOMATION_NOTICE: Browser automation detected. Drag & drop files instead of clicking.

BODY.TITLE: Body
BODY.TEXT_PLACEHOLDER: Enter your message here. Use {{1}}, {{2}}, etc. for dynamic content.

BUTTONS.TITLE: Buttons
BUTTONS.EMPTY: No buttons added. Click 'Add Button' to add interactive buttons.
BUTTONS.COPY_CODE_HELP: This button will copy the OTP code from the body. Make sure to include {{1}} in the body for the code.
